summary: Build a health-focused app where users enter age, weight, health conditions/sicknesses, and blood pressure, then tap a “Search Foods” button to receive food recommendations tailored to those inputs.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Friendly flat illustration of assorted healthy foods (healthy-foods-hero.dim_1400x600.png)
- Simple line icon of a heart with a fork (health-app-icon.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Build a frontend flow with a health input form (age, weight, sicknesses/health conditions, systolic and diastolic blood pressure) and a primary button labeled exactly “Search Foods” that triggers fetching recommendations and then displays the results.
Create a results view that displays recommended foods with explanations, and includes a clear English disclaimer that the app provides general wellness suggestions and is not medical advice.
Apply a cohesive, creative visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styles) appropriate for a health/nutrition tool, avoiding blue-and-purple as the primary palette.
Add generated static imagery for the app and render it from the frontend as static assets (do not serve images from the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Health input form (age, weight, sicknesses/health conditions, blood pressure) with a “Search Foods” button
Personalized food recommendations/results page based on entered health conditions and blood pressure

Create a backend API that accepts a user's health inputs (age, weight, list of sicknesses/health conditions, and blood pressure) and returns a structured list of recommended foods tailored to those inputs.

Implement backend recommendation logic that uses sickness/condition keywords and blood pressure categories (e.g., low/normal/elevated/high) to select foods and provide brief explanations per food item.

projectName: Health input app with tailored food recommendations
